name: 🧜‍♀️ Moja UI - FREE Top UI Kit & Design system
description:
Hello there. Thank you for considering Moja UI. 

Moja UI is a user-friendly and robust UI library and design system that will help you power up your designs. It is free and will remain so in perpetuity, regardless of what it grows into. 

Dev kit coming.

You can support by 

  • Please like this 💝 here on Figma 👆 or drop a comment.
  • Consider buying me a coffee :)

Its deeply appreciated.

Updates drop weekly.

  • Don't forget to checkout the change log in the getting started page OR
  • Follow Moja UI on Twitter (@moja_ui) for updates :) Last update - (5th /6/2022)

Features

  • 8500+ Components & variants
  • 1000+ function icons with size variants ready: 16px, 24px, 32px (adjusted down to stroke width)
  • 258 flag icons with 2 size variants
  • Popular brand logos (236) and icons (506)
  • Responsive typography (adjust/reduce/expand to your taste)
  • Slim & adequate set of color styles to get you going on your UI project fast.


✔️ FREE Lifetime updates - weekly (More components and cool features coming)

✔️ Sample/demo components to get you going.

✔️ Documentation

✔️ Content on UX best practices for component usage in your UI.

✔️ Autolayout

✔️ Easily expandable variant structure


Components

Accordions, Alert - Inline, Alert - Sticky, Avatar, Badge(Label/Lozenge), Buttons, Button group, Link, Callout, Checkbox, Radio, Chip(Pill/Tag), Date picker, Dropdown menu, Input text, Input group, Input dropdown/Dropdown, List (simple), List (Advanced, Popover, Progress - Bar, Progress - Circle, Slider, Tab, Textarea, Toggle, Tooltip.


Quick links

- Request a component

- Moja is free. Please support. Buy me a coffee :)

- Reach out/Testimonial
